name: handmade SMG pack
description: a complete kit to create a submachine gun from scratch. Heavily regulated throughout the country.

name: handmade revolver rifle pack
description: A complete kit for a revolver rifle. Perfect for when you want to make your life in a hostile frontier. Come to think about it, thats the whole world now, isn't it?

name: handmade lever-action pack
description: A complete kit to make a lever-action firearm. Great for aspiring cowboys!

name: Handmade bolt-action pack
description: The perfect handmade kit for someone who wants to kill from a distance.

name: Handmade pump-action pack
description: A kit to make a homemade pump-action shotgun. Commonly sold in backwater towns, to the redneck who wants pride in his boomstick.

name: Homemade Gatling Gun Pack
description: This heavily-regulated bundle of joy contains the necessary pieces to make a makeshift gatling gun.
